str2: To make safe (secure, fast). From asphales; to render secure.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: To seal, set a seal upon. From sphragis; to stamp for security or preservation; by implication, to keep secret, to attest.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A stone; met: of Jesus as the chief stone in a building. Apparently a primary word; a stone.
(a) gen: with, in company with, (b) acc: (1) behind, beyond, after, of place, (2) after, of time, with nouns, neut. of adjectives.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A guard, watch. Of Latin origin; 'custody', i.e. A Roman sentry.
